subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Plaxico Burress may be the best reason there is hope for the Jets — as a playoff contender and as a team that has become notorious for compulsively misbehaving and shooting itself in the proverbial foot.
snippet: Plaxico Burress may be the best reason there is hope for the Jets — as a playoff contender and as a team that has become notorious for compulsively misbehaving and shooting itself in the proverbial foot.
